data.NARR: Let's start the inspection work.
pick up the lower arm.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm

data.NARR: Bring the lower arm to the inspection area of ​​the work table.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm

data.NARR: We will begin the process of inspecting the removed hydraulic suspension parts.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm

data.NARR: A typical example of failure of a rubber bushing is cracking or tearing due to hardening of rubber. If the rubber is damaged, the riding comfort decreases and driving safety decreases when driving on irregular roads.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm

data.NARR: Visually check the condition of the rubber bushing.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm
data.PRCTN: If the rubber boots of the ball joints are damaged, the grease will leak out and cause noise. If you ignore the noise and continue driving, you may have an accident where the ball joint falls out.

data.NARR: Typical examples of ball joint failure are boot tearing due to hardening of rubber or ball bearing damage due to insufficient grease. If the rubber is damaged, the grease inside the boot will scatter, and the ball bearing will not be lubricated due to insufficient grease during continuous driving. This is a similar principle to a constant velocity joint, and it is an item that requires quick repair in case of failure. Causes of excessive play in ball joints include damage to ball bearings due to aging, damage to rubber boots, and insufficient internal grease.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm

data.NARR: Visually inspect the ball joint condition.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm
data.PRCTN: If the rubber boot of the ball joint is damaged, grease may leak and cause noise.

data.NARR: Check the play by moving the ball joint.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm

data.NARR: Causes of excessive play in ball joints include damage to ball bearings due to aging, damage to rubber boots, and insufficient internal grease. It is not possible to replace only the ball joint separately, and in case of repair, the lower arm is replaced.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm
data.CRS_SCRIPT: Checking lower arm ball joint play…
data.PRCTN: If you continue to drive with the ball joint loose, you may also have an accident in which the ball joint falls out.

data.NARR: Find the damaged area.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm
data.PRCTN: If the lower arm is damaged, normal driving is impossible because it cannot support the body.

data.NARR: exchange the lower arm.
data.TITLE: Check the lower arm

data.NARR: pick up the spring.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly

data.NARR: Bring the spring to the check area on the work table.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly

data.NARR: Find the damaged area.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly
data.PRCTN: If the coil spring is damaged, it may not support the vehicle body and cause the vehicle to collapse.

data.NARR: It is extremely rare for a spring to break or break, and there are cases where the spring's elasticity is weakened and the shock absorption capacity is lowered. If the spring breaks while driving, the tire may tear, the wheel may be crushed, and the steering force may be lost, resulting in a serious accident. If cracks are identified in the spring when disassembling the strut assembly, a serious accident may occur, so it must be replaced after consultation with the owner.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly

data.NARR: exchange the spring
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly

data.NARR: pick up the shock absorber.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly
data.CRS_SCRIPT: Checking the shock absorber oil leak...

data.NARR: Bring the shock absorber to the inspection area of ​​the work table.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly
data.CRS_SCRIPT: Checking the shock absorber oil leak...

data.NARR: Look for signs of oil leaks.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly
data.CRS_SCRIPT: Checking the shock absorber oil leak...
data.PRCTN: If oil leaks in the piston part, the piston may not operate normally. Please check the reaction force.

data.NARR: If the shock absorber oil leaks, the shock absorption ability is reduced and smooth up and down movement is impossible, resulting in reduced riding comfort.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly

data.NARR: Press the shock absorber piston.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly
data.PRCTN: If the piston of the gas shock absorber is not restored, it may cause deterioration in riding comfort.

data.NARR: The shock absorber piston compression check method should check whether the piston returns to its original height after depressing it and the return speed.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly

data.NARR: exchange the shock absorber.
data.TITLE: Check the strut assembly

data.NARR: Finished working on Inspection. thank you.
